Sentencas: Solid electrolytes are increasingly being used in active electrochemical devices such as fuel cells and batteries.
Titulo: A model for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack degradation

Sentencas: Several fuel cells or batteries are connected in series to form a stack or a battery pack.
Titulo: A model for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack degradation

Sentencas: The present manuscript examines the phenomenon of degradation in such devices, whose origin lies in the very basics of local thermodynamic equilibrium and transport.
Titulo: A model for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack degradation

Sentencas: The specific example of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) is addressed here.
Titulo: A model for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack degradation

Sentencas: If a single cell (or a few cells) in a stack exhibits higher resistance than the rest of the cells, stack failure often initiates at such a cell.
Titulo: A model for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack degradation

Sentencas: The cell is then driven by, and exhibits lower voltage than the rest of the cells, and often even a negative voltage.
Titulo: A model for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack degradation

Sentencas: The objective of this paper is to present a model for stack degradation when one of the cells exhibits a negative voltage.
Titulo: A model for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack degradation

Sentencas: The existence of low level electronic conduction through the electrolyte plays central role in degradation.
Titulo: A model for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack degradation

Sentencas: It is shown that if a cell exhibits a negative voltage, the oxygen chemical potential within the electrolyte can exceed that in the oxidant, and/or can drop below that in the fuel.
Titulo: A model for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack degradation

Sentencas: This can lead to high internal oxygen partial pressure resulting in electrode cracking and delamination, and/or very low oxygen partial pressure leading to local electrolyte decomposition.
Titulo: A model for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack degradation

Sentencas: Both situations can lead to cell and stack degradation.
Titulo: A model for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack degradation
